title: Sheet metal in industry
creator_credit: Academy Film Productions and Bruce McNaughton
brief_description: Sheet metal work in Australia, showing manufacture of varied articles including domestic hardware, surgical instruments, refrigerator cabinets, heating and ventilating ducts, vehicle bodies and jet engines. Shows the kinds of work available in the field
